bin

Class SendEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • bin.SendEmail

  • public class SendEmail
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to send the email for the employees and the contractors. One time password for the particular users will be sent using this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SendEmail()

      This method is used to message which will be sent to the user.
      static java.lang.String otpMail(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String otp)
      This method is used to send the OTP message to the user.
      static void sendContractorEmail(java.lang.String recepient, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String dateOfJoin, java.lang.String dateOfTermination)
      This method is used to send the email for the particular email ID of the contractor.
      static void sendEmail(java.lang.String recepient, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String dateOfJoin)
      This method is used to send the email for the particular email ID.

      This method is used to send the one time password to the user in email.

      • sendEmail

        public static void sendEmail(java.lang.String recepient,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String dateOfJoin)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to send the email for the particular email ID.
        Parameters:
        recepient - This parameter contains the email address of the receiver.
        username - This parameter is the name of the user which is used at the salutation of the mail.
        dateOfJoin - This parameter is the joining date of the employee.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception will be used on the Input error.
        See Also:
        Exception

        username - This parameter is the name of the user which is used at the salutation of the mail.
        dateOfJoin - This parameter is the joining date of the contractor.

                                       java.lang.String otp)
        This method is used to send the OTP message to the user.
        Parameters:
        username - This parameter is the name of the user which is used at the salutation of the mail.
        otp - This parameter is the one time password that is generated.
